S.FORM: badukuk akenek kanen ku badukuk. mangazuway a badukuk palamelen tu titi misakabi. siwkay nu babaungen badukuk sa, u lemangawan kuyni, taneng mukan, akenek. u kapahay a lami'. sabelen ku mangazuay a kaway , asu'. manamuh mukan ku Sakizaya. mauzip ku badukuk i buyubuyuan. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
